titleInfo.title: DIANA and applications to fermion production in electron-positron annihilation

mods.abstract: A demonstration of the use of DIANA has been given. As an example, the process e(+)e(-) --> tt was selected. Recent developments are indicated: automation of momenta distribution, the status of parallelization of FORM jobs, handling of topologies and new features for the implementation of fermions. (C) 2004 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
